---
title: "Accessing your results"
output: html_document
---

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
devtools::load_all("..")
```

```{r options, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
simrOptions(nsim=25, progress=FALSE)
```

First let's specify a model to use.

```{r}
model1 <- glmer(z ~ x + (1|g), family="poisson", data=example)
print(model1)
```

## `powerSim`

```{r}
ps <- powerSim(model1)
summary(ps)
```

## `powerCurve`

```{r, message=FALSE}
pc <- powerCurve(model1)
summary(pc)
```
